text: In Nigeria, the academic grading system scales from A (First class) to F (fail). Below is the grading system of Nigerian schools. == Table== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Percentage !Grade |- |70 - 100% |A |- |60 - 69% |B |- |50 - 59% |C |- |45 - 49% |D |- |40 - 44% |E |- |0 - 39% |F |} == References == == External links == *https://allafrica.com/stories/201811010293.html *https://www.naijaonlinebiz.com/newly-approved-grading-system-for-nigerian- universities/ == See also == *Nigeria *Federal government of Nigeria *Grading in education Nigeria Category:Education in Nigeria Category:Academia in Nigeria
title: Academic grading in Nigeria
